original_text: And it came to pass at the end of the year, that the host of Syria came up against him: and they came to Judah and Jerusalem, and destroyed all the princes of the people from among the people, and sent all the spoil of them unto the king of Damascus.
korean_text: 일 주년 말에 아람 군대가 요아스를 치려고 올라와서 유다와 예루살렘에 이르러 백성 중에서 모든 방백들을 다 죽이고 노략한 물건을 다메섹 왕에게로 보내니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass at the end of year
that the host of Syria came up against him
and they came to Judah and Jerusalem
and destroyed all the princes of the people
and sent all the spoil of them
